articles.title: Letter of the Holy Father to the Bishops of the United States of America (10 February 2025) | Francis - Vatican.va
articles.description: Letter of the Holy Father to the Bishops of the United Sates of America, 10 February 2025
articles.content:
Dear Brothers in the Episcopate,
I am writing today to address a few words to you in these delicate moments that you are living as Pastors of the People of God who walk together in the United States… [+6832 chars]
